meanings.definition: The quality of being dedicated or committed to a task or purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her dedication to her studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to his job earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The dedication of the squirrel to collecting acorns was truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: The dedication of the marathon runner was like a flame that never flickered.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the gardener to her plants was evident in the lush garden she maintained.

meanings.definition: The act of devoting time, effort, or resources to a particular cause or activity.
meanings.sent1: Their dedication to volunteering at the shelter helped many animals find homes.
meanings.sent2: The dedication of the team members ensured the project was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The dedication of the chef to creating the perfect dish led to some interesting experiments.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to yoga was like a steady stream flowing through her life.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the artist to her craft was evident in every stroke of the brush.
